${modID}:Low.NAME: Moribund Form
DESCRIPTION: (Below 1/3 HP) NL Your Attacks deal double damage.

${modID}:Mid.NAME: Froth Form
DESCRIPTION: (Between 1/3 and 2/3 HP) NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:High.NAME: Molt Form
DESCRIPTION: (Above 2/3 HP) NL At the end of your turn, gain 3 #yBlock.
